page.title: 15Survey: Ambitions (cont)
page.content: Reasons for ambitions. {Why America?} Most people who want to go to America want to go because of the funfairs,Disney Land and Hollywood and also famous people.People also want good sun tans and warm weather,jobs are wanted eg. a cowboy.One person said "there are more snack bars". {Hairdressers. "I like messing about with peoples hair".A person said when asked why they wanted to be a hairdresser.One person wants to copy her elder cousin.Some people just want the money {Stay in Bromsgrove. 1 or 2 people want to stay in Bromsgrove because they can't be bothered to move out.Other people like Bromsgrove and don't want to move out. One person wants to play for Bromsgrove Rovers.
